text: Stigmodera macularia, is a species of beetle in the family Buprestidae restricted to Southeastern Australia. ==Description== Stigmodera macularia have yellow elytra with a deeply pitted surface. The puncturations are colored in black and the pronotum is dark. ==Gallery== File:Stigmodera maculariaNeerimEastOct14.jpg|Stigmodera macularia ==Distribution== This species can be found mainly in Victoria and New South Wales.Atlas Living Australia ==References== Buprestid Pages; Martin Lagerwey Category:Buprestidae Category:Beetles described in 1805
title: Stigmodera macularia
